meanings.definition: A type of hydrocarbon found in diesel fuel.
meanings.sent1: The mechanic explained that cetanes are important for diesel engines.
meanings.sent2: Diesel fuel contains cetanes that help in combustion.
meanings.sent3: The cetanes in the fuel were having a party in the engine!
meanings.sent4: The cetanes roared to life in the engine, igniting the fuel.
meanings.sent5: I could smell the cetanes burning as the truck started.

meanings.definition: The cetane number, a measure of the ignition quality of diesel fuel.
meanings.sent1: The higher the cetane number, the better the diesel fuel quality.
meanings.sent2: Drivers should pay attention to the cetane number when refueling.
meanings.sent3: The cetane number on the fuel gauge made the truck smile.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was like a high cetane number, always ready to ignite.
meanings.sent5: The cetane number was like a secret code for the engine's power.
